mapper.select: select t_vpoint, t_hpoint, t_name, t_addr, t_hp, t_image1 from myjeju_travel

select rno, tid, t_name, t_tag, t_infor, t_infor2, t_addr, t_vpoint, t_hpoint, t_hp, t_like, t_image1, t_image2, t_image3, t_image4, t_image5 from(select rownum rno, tid, t_name, t_tag, t_infor, t_infor2, t_addr, t_vpoint, t_hpoint, t_hp, t_like, t_image1, t_image2, t_image3, t_image4, t_image5 from(select tid, t_name, t_tag, t_infor, t_infor2, t_addr, t_vpoint, t_hpoint, t_hp, t_like, t_image1, t_image2, t_image3, t_image4, t_image5 from myjeju_travel order by t_like desc))
select tid, t_name, t_tag, t_infor, t_like, t_image1 from (select tid, t_name, t_tag, t_infor, t_like, t_image1 from myjeju_travel order by t_like desc) where rownum <= 3
select tid, t_name, t_tag, t_infor, t_infor2, t_addr, t_hp, t_like, t_image1, t_image2, t_image3, t_image4, t_image5 from myjeju_travel where tid=#{tid}

select myjeju_travel.t_name, myjeju_photo_spot.tid, myjeju_photo_spot.ps_name, myjeju_photo_spot.ps_infor, myjeju_photo_spot.ps_psfile from myjeju_travel, myjeju_photo_spot where myjeju_travel.tid = myjeju_photo_spot.tid and myjeju_travel.tid=#{tid}

select myjeju_travel.t_name, myjeju_car_spot.tid, myjeju_car_spot.cs_name, myjeju_car_spot.cs_infor, myjeju_car_spot.cs_csfile from myjeju_travel, myjeju_car_spot where myjeju_travel.tid = myjeju_car_spot.tid and myjeju_travel.tid=#{tid}
mapper.insert: delete from myjeju_t_heart where id=#{id} and tid=#{tid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from myjeju_t_heart where id=#{id} and tid=#{tid}
mapper.update: update myjeju_travel set t_like = t_like+1 where tid=#{tid}
update myjeju_travel set t_like = t_like-1 where tid=#{tid}
